EmailTemplate.name: Care Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit: QuickBooks Training Check In
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Just wanted to check-in and see how things were going after your YYY training session with ZZZ. He/She mentioned you went over XXX.
Is there anything else we can help you with at this time? Please let me know
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | Enterprise Account Manager
Work Phone: {!User.Phone} ext {!User.Extension} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
